text:
Prithee
               
              return
              .
               
              With
               
              thy
               
              approach
              ,
               
              I
               
              know
              ,

speaker: KING
text:
My
               
              comfort
               
              comes
               
              along
              .
              —
              Break
               
              up
               
              the
               
              court
              .

speaker: KING
text:
I
               
              say
              ,
